China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 21 日星期三 09:20:48 GMT 120
On frontline Taiwan islands, fishermen wary of China tensionsTaiwanese fishermen in sensitive waters around frontline islands near the Chinese coast say they are worried about rising tensions, after two Chinese nationals died during a chase with Taiwan's coast guard. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:02:55 GMT UXJ4Z36N7NJNFJN4RSJC3VIRLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/frontline-taiwan-islands-fishermen-wary-china-tensions-2024-02-21/Ann Wang, Walid Berrazeg世界亚太地区
China's vice foreign minister Ma Zhaoxu to attend G20 in BrazilChina's Vice Foreign Minister Ma Zhaoxu will attend the G20 foreign ministers' meeting from Feb. 21 to 22 in Rio de Janeiro, a spokesperson for the foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:55:51 GMT 2CIABPMQUNO67FX7OCKLAKSQ2M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-vice-foreign-minister-ma-zhaoxu-attend-g20-brazil-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
China's childcare costs among highest in world, think tank saysChina is one of the world's most expensive places to raise a child, relative to its GDP per capita, a prominent Chinese think tank said on Wednesday as it detailed the time and opportunity costs for women who opt to have children in the country. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:58:42 GMT WQJBUYNEZRJCNNIXEGKVFAERSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-childcare-costs-among-highest-world-think-tank-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
Australia loses out as Chinese tourists flock to Southeast AsiaAs Chinese tourism booms to visa-free countries in Southeast Asia, Australia is losing out, with more cost-conscious mainland travellers also choosing cheaper destinations closer to home, according to tour operators and industry data. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:13:54 GMT RGKC3IAQPJJHLDF5IBYDEQZGGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-loses-out-chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Rise of fast-fashion Shein, Temu roils global air cargo industryThe rapid rise of fast-fashion e-commerce retailers such as Shein and Temu is upending the global air cargo industry, as they increasingly vie for limited air-cargo space to woo consumers with rapid transit times, more than ten industry sources said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:05:17 GMT TGEYXFYYZ5JBVJZRQFJGPGA2W4 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/rise-fast-fashion-shein-temu-roils-global-air-cargo-industry-2024-02-21/Arriana McLymore, Casey Hall, Lisa Barrington商业零售与消费品
Chinese banks approve $17 billion of loans under 'whitelist' project - housing authorityChina's housing authority said 123.6 billion yuan ($17.20 billion) of development loans have been approved and 29.4 billion yuan have been issued under a special mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit property sector. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 05:05:29 GMT DQ4QWBDIRJL53ICMKO3ZGK7II4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-banks-approve-17-bln-loans-under-whitelist-project-housing-authority-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
